summary:
### **Dividend Announcement Summary (Appendix 3A.1)**  
- **Security**: ATM (CHESS Depositary Interests 1:5)  
- **Dividend Amount**: **IDR 758.863350 per security** (AUD equivalent not yet disclosed; expected 7/7/2025)  
- **Key Dates**:  
  - **Ex-Date**: 23/6/2025  
  - **Record Date**: 24/6/2025  
  - **Payment Date**: 11/7/2025  
- **Tax Implications**:  
  - **Unfranked** (0% franked)  
  - **Withholding Tax**: 20%  
- **Source**: Approved at AGM (12/6/2024) from FY2024 net profit.  
- **Additional Info**: [Link](https://www.antam.com/general-meetings-of-shareholder/annual-general-meeting-of-shareholders-year-2024)  

*No material omissions; concise to trading/capital markets relevance.*
